title: Hulu removes new sign-ups and free trials from its Android apps on phones and TVs
content:
Google has been cracking down on how Android apps handle payments, and that’s resulted in some big changes. Now, the Hulu app for Android has ditched the ability to make a new account or start a free trial within its app on phones and TVs.

more…

The post Hulu removes new sign-ups and free trials from its Android apps on phones and TVs appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Due to changes in Google's billing policy, Hulu for Android and Android TV has ditched the ability to start a free trial on its app.
